caption: Its balcony is a good choice for Covid era. Nice and helpful staff. We had to change our table due to rain and they managed it. Pizzas were delicious. I liked their coffee. There was 20% for parties of 8+.  Pros: Pizza, Coffee, Staff, Balcony  Cons: Little bit hard to handle kids and there ware no toys or crayons offered.
Food was delicious! Service was awesome.

We went to Bernie's for drinks around 8pm. The hostess was very friendly and got us a table right away next to the fire pit on the roof. They have a great rooftop which is perfect for COVID with lots of open space and heaters. The drinks were very good and well made. The server was also very friendly and attentive. We didn't have any food, but based on what I experienced there having drinks, I will be back for dinner!
Fun bar with a great rooftop. Good happy hour on weekdays
Outstanding food, delicious cocktails, and lovely staff!
Can't beat a good burger from Bernie's! A great spot for brunch as well. They have a pretty  concise menu that doesn't disappoint.
Great food and atmosphere.
Wonderful experience, happy customer here.
Tables were not six feet apart; menu and food took forever as server flirts with someone at the bar; over-salted.
Very nice and spacious patio, the drinks and cocktails were awesome and the staff was very polite and kept social distance very well!
Excellent rooftop dining for business lunch
Good food, pleasant service.
First time here, pre-movie dinner with my boy. Blown. A. Way. Incredibly delicious cocktails, amazing appetizer, some of the best salmon I have ever tasted. Pleasant atmosphere and top notch service!
Good drinks. Fresh ingredients. Nice roof deck.
Me and my friends enjoy the atmosphere, food, and our waitress was excellent. Everyone was excellent. We will be back again.

Such a great experience! The food was phenomenal as well as service. I love the diverse atmosphere and great music. Amazing views and impeccable food presentation. Seriously, one of the best meals I've had in a while. The rooftop dining is where it's at! Great job Daisy G. You're amazing. Thank you for serving us.

Staff was super nice, helpful.. Did carry out due to a rain storm, so the upper deck for outside seating was closed. Food was on time and the hero was in fact the Bernie Burger... Opted for the fries, that i would not do again, would try the homemade chips next time through! Definitely would take another run at it!!
We split the burger and salmon sandwich, both very good! Korean deviled eggs and Cobb salad also great! Sat on the roof top and enjoyed a good breeze. We'll be back♥️

I think this resturant deserves one star because it is open and has a roof that is about it.But I don't want to hurt them so I will give it 4. Nothing at all to celebrate here. I am surprised with all the amazing spots in town this place is still open. If you are older and looking for a place that lacks ambiance this is your spot. If you are young and looking for a good vibe this is not your spot. The music ruins the mood. I came I'm and wanted to leave right away. Our server was nice though
The rooftop, food & service were all great.  The hummus with lamb was some of the best this group of 5 have ever had.  Will definitely go back.
This place for me is a whole new experience. Staffs are polite and serving with respect. Mark is a great manager as well. I will be back here. Mark my word!
I love their cuisine. Lovely and excellent!. And by the way, Jewel is awesome.
Delicious food, nice atmosphere, great service, good people 💕

One of the best BURGERS in town.  Cannot wait to go back.  Used to frequent Bernie's weekly when we lived in river north.  Often took friends from out of town there because every menu item was so consistently good.  Highly recommend the burger and the hummus.
Great place for lunch! Fast and good for office crowds in the summer.
This place really deserves five stars.  Bernie's is one of the best restaurants in the city.  In addition, they have good service and an incredible patio.
Excellent food! Lovely service!
Burger was great but a little expensive for $16
Slow service at lunch but good food
It's was great, especially the buffalo chicken sandwich is great.
Very nice place. Had a good time
Great rooftop patio for people watching, good happy hour specials, get the hummus. Located in the perfect area too.
Excellent food, I had pasta which was really good and tasty
Really great burger (70% short rib, 30% pork belly)...get it with the egg and bacon....you're welcome.  Oh..skip the chips and go straight for the killa fries....
Had a light brunch here and was such a classy place.
Went for brunch with a friend here and the skillets were amazing! Really fun experience as you got to customize the items.  The service was very friendly too.  Definitely will be returning!
Food was delicious.

Hadn't been in a few years even though I enjoyed my 1st visit.  This time around I'm thinking why did I wait so long. Started with the hummus and it's the best I've ever had.  The service was awsome, best in class.  Salmon burger and salad well done.  Can not go wrong here wish I lived closer.
A great brunch place! Their summer rooftop is amazing! The food is phenomenal and the drinks are decent. Highly recommended!
Really good happy hour specials. The lamb is delicious.
Delightful fresh cocktails menu - I wish this gem was closer to home.
Worth the time and money
The food was fine. 1 of our party had their food come out so late after everyone else's that they had finished already when it finally arrived.
Very very tasty ! Small portions but the burger and Turkey sandwich- awesome
Awesome place!
Had some seriously good burgers here and delicious side dishes.
Bernie's burger was amazing, bacon and avocado on it is a must! The chips that come with it were good but definitely sub for fries instead.

I found myself nearby at lunchtime. I am sure to visit again. I had the Bernie Burger...short rib and pork belly burger that one could tell was made with care. Came medium, so if you like it well done, ask. Ordered the large fries. Huge portion best for several people to share. If you are dining solo, get the small order. But definitely try some. Hand cut and tasty. They come on the crispy side. Wait staff was excellent! Ask for Collin. Exceptional cooking.

Although this off the beaten path, do not let the out side trick you! Inside the decor is very modern and beautifully decorated. We split several appetizers which included the following: meatballs, brussel sprouts, patats bravas, and the octopus. Everything was amazing except the octopus was fishy. We also had their blueberry lemon tarte which was Devine!
The Bernies burger!! ❤️
Very cool rooftop bar. Food delicious and drinks spot on.

Upstairs bartenders were totally rude; ignored us for two hours - no bill, no service, nothing. Acted like we didnt exist as we just sat there. Food wasn't as we asked and wasn't good But service was just awful last night. Wont be back again.
fun drinks, good food, nice atmosphere
Very good pizza
One of my favorite spots in River North for a delicious dinner. The food is exceptional and the space is beautiful! They also have an amazing rooftop, the perfect spot to spend Chicago summers.
Very good hummus
Awesome cocktails and the rooftop is great!
Skillet was amazing! Donuts were a solid choice as well
Great drinks although pricey and the best, juiciest Turkey burger I have ever had

I was back in Wrigleyville after living here about 20 years ago. Bernie’s has changed quite a bit! Of course, i was only here in an altered state back in the day, but I don’t recall it being nearly this nice. Food was pretty good too and service was fine (not great attention, but with no alcohol, she was giving her bigger tippers more attention. Can’t really blame her for that).

Went there for a quick business meeting last Friday night— had reservations for 7:00pm.  We got there about 20 mins early and were seated at that time.  However, after someone came to fill our glasses with water, we were not greeted by waitress for 20 mins.  Then she asks, “do you guys want to order drinks while you wait for your 3rd party member or would you like more time?”  More time?!? We had been waiting for 20 mins for you to ask us for drinks! Unbelievable.  Then when the 3rd showed up around 7:15, waitress took another 10 mins to get drink order.  In the meantime, we were still waiting on our initial round to arrive, which took the bartender another 10 mins to make.  All said and done, between ordering and receiving our drinks, about 30 mins passed.  It wasn’t even that busy, she had maybe 4 other tables from what I can see.  Maybe I’m wrong - I don’t want to assume.  But if you’re waiting tables and you’re having trouble keeping up, do the right thing and make sure your guests are in the loop about the delays.  In our case, there was radio silence.  This was the first and last time I ever go to Bernie’s, let alone with a client.  What a bad experience that was and obviously so out of touch, they didn’t even think it was an issue. At least not enough to apologize or even acknowledge the situation.  So tired of these places - there seem to more and more restaurants that think they’re doing ME a favor by existing.  In a town like Chicago— there is a better place literally next door.
Great food and drink with a roof top setting.

I went at lunch time and it wasn't too crowded. It's not loud and you can actually have a conversation. Service was good and attentive with refilling drinks. I got the BLT and it was delicious! The chips that come with it are good, but you don't get very many. The roof top deck is lovely!

The two Bartenders working upstairs on 8/16 had an attitude like they were being forced against their will to work.  Consider smiling and being polite in the service industry.  Place is lucky they have cool roof deck.
Mediocre food and terrible service
GREAT roof top, not far from downtown. We had a wonderful brunch.

Rooftop is beautiful! Portion sizes should be larger on sides like hashbrowns. If you have a big appetite you may be very disappointed. An overall good experience for most of our group. Staff is attentive and accommodating.
My friends and I visited the rooftop. It was a lovely spot with good service. I would recommend and visit again. I would suggest making a reservation as they were busy.
Super good

First review of this place. My side of bacon was very good. That is all. The rooftop patio is also very nice. Come and drop by and bring Mother. She will be happy, and I was happy. I didn't get any other food but the bacon was a reason to return for other things.

Have always had a wonderful experience! Came for a post sales mission dinner and as usual, the burgers + spinach dip did not disappoint. In addition to the food being delicious, our server was very sweet and attentive. Always a fan of Bernie's - 10/10 can't wait to return :)
Make your own salad is awesome!

Let's start out with the positive.  The upstairs dining is very nice, the menu is small, but has something for all and the drinks were great. Also we had a few problems, which the manager took care of.  We had 3 problems:. We ordered an appetizer that never came, 2 plates of pasta came cold (were supposed to be hot) and worse of all, during our meal, a rat scurried across the patio.  So over the venue was nice, the service was uneven .... And there was a rat!
Fries and elote are amazing!!
Great rooftop, good food
Neat rooftop atmosphere. I had the salmon & it was quite tasty!
Delicious food, great for happy hour!

Bernie's got our large group in right away after the place across the street lost our reservation. They were so friendly and accommodating. It's a gorgeous place with prompt, attentive staff and fantastic food. The best hummus I've ever had, and melt-in-your-mouth brioche French toast.

6/28/19 at 5:30 my first time visiting the woman at the front door already gave me a disgusting look before entering. As i got closer to her she ask did i have reservations. I said no. She told me well the rooftop is all booked and reserved but as i went online to see about reservations slots for every 15 mins was available. Idk what that was about but i feel disrespected
Nice rooftop
Food was superb
Great food great service. Farm to table. Homemade bloody Mary mix. Flavors were delish. Would recommend for brunch.. might need reservation
Great rooftop vibe.
Great rooftop deck and tasty appetizers
One of the best turkey burgers I've had
Always tasty!
Spent some time with my co-workers at the bar. Overall experience good... my margarita was rimmed with sugar instead of salt, though.
Great day to sit on their rooftop patio! The food came out a bit out of order (ie one entree came out before the appetizer and the other entree after) but overall good food and atmosphere!

The food was excellent, but the service was lackluster. We sat on the patio upstairs around 3:30 pm, so no one was there. Im not sure if they lost track of us, but I had to either keep asking for service - eventually leading to me asking a manager for a dedicated waitress. We didn't get this, but he insured us there were 3 bartenders that we're supposed to be waiting us. Once we told him our frustrations though, our food and drinks seemed to be expedited. The food was excellent I just wish we felt like we existed

I made a reservation here a month ago for my sisters bachelorette party, 8 people. They called 3 hours before to cancel my reservation because of another party, with no other options whatsoever. Don’t expect them to honor your reservations, the manager literally said to me they don’t always because of situations like this. Don’t waste your time, honestly.
Made reservations a month ago, they canceled 3 hours before reservation day of due to a more important party.
RN's best kept lunch secret!
Lively crowd that filled the place with noise so you could conduct business in private
Garbage
Creative, interesting menu. Create your own salad.  Wine flights.  Delightful place.
Food and service was great and the atmosphere was a high end comfortable. Menu is pretty limited during lunch, haven't been for dinner.
Service is slow and incompetent. Have given this place 4 separate tries and have been progressively disappointed. Food orders are never correct. Took 1hr 45mims for lunch... how is that acceptable?
Loved it but, its pricey
Good
Lovely ambiance, great food, and superb service!
I had the combo italien beef and sausage. I think it's better than Al's.
Sandwiches are a good value. Skillet is tasty but don't accept a large skillet plate to come if you order one, its half size and double price.
I usually eat in the suburbs so my opinion towards price is probably skewed.  The burger is good,  but small,  so I'd say it's expensive.  The flatbread looked like it was a better value play.

A good gastropub with all the usual trappings.  Went to happy hour and they had better than average oysters with a mignon sauce that was special and a good wine.  The regular menu looked good, but not unique.   A good place that is good for something new.

I really liked this place. It's cute on the inside with its low lighting and comfy half couch/half chair tables. Our server was friendly and attentive. The bathrooms were clean and orderly. All of those things combined with the weekday happy hour makes it worth visiting again.
Bernie’s is one of my favorite brunch spots in Chicago. Amazing food and the best G&T’s in the city. Service is flawless every time, Jessica is especially awesome!

Always a solid time at Bernie's.  My girlfriends and I love happy hour there, especially in the summer on their beautiful rooftop patio! Service is always on point and our server Jessica the other night was no exception.  Go and try some of their amazing cocktails or equally awesome food.  You will not be disappointed!

Our hotel recommended this restaurant for a nice dinner last night, and they were absolutely correct! We were seated immediately in the beautiful dining room and our Server Jessica was amazing. She recommended their salmon entree and I was very pleased with it. Melted in my mouth! The only downside to the experience was we were to full to try the desserts!

Came for an impromptu girls happy hour last night and we had a blast! The Bernie's Gin and Tonic that my server Jessica suggested was seriously the best G and T I have ever had.  Food, service, drinks and ambiance were all top notch.  Definitely recommend!!
I was in for lunch yesterday. Our server Savannah recommended the turkey burger. The food and service were outstanding!
Really delicious food across the menu. Bartender was helpful in selecting a perfect drink.

Had a wonderful Brunch here this past Sunday. The hotel we were staying at suggested it and we couldn't have been more pleased! The space was beautiful, the food was delicious and service was flawless. Jess took very good care of us and seemed to anticipate our needs before we did! We will definitely be coming back whenever we're in Chicago!
Tables and Chairs are really great . . . the food are awesome
I was in tonight celebrating my birthday and everything was great from the food to out server Savannah who had brought a champagne toast for my birthday which just made the night perfect!
I went in for lunch today and had the most amazing food and service. I had ordered the lamb hummus which our server Savannah recommended and she was spot on because it was delicious.

Bernie's was a phenomenal experience with an atmosphere that was welcoming but luxiorious. We felt like we were being pampered the entire time we were there! Savana our server was charming and fun, but also possibly precognitive. She was seemed to know what we wanted before we wanted it and she never steered us wrong. The octopus was to die for and the brick chicken, while not exactly what I expected, blew my socks clean off!
Had a fantastic experience here for lunch last week. Food was great and our server Savannah was amazing. First time here but will definitely be returning in the future.
Great place for lunch or dinner in River North! The hummus with lamb is a must try, as well as the turkey burger!

Love love love the ambience, the rooftop dining in the summer, and the wine.  Killer appetizer that you MUST have: lamb hummus... everything about this incredible including the pita bread!  Service is always outstanding!

Bernie’s is the best. The staff, and the chef for dinner are AMAZING. The food is always spot on and the team in the kitchen ensure the best quality makes it onto the plate and to your table!  It is a must for dinner in river north!  You won’t be disappointed!
best brunch 👌

Ordered a gift card for a gift and received it in just a couple of days (I live out of town).   They called me to let me know it was on its way and followed up with an email to ensure I received it.  Great customer service!  My sister loves the restaurant and I can’t wait to try it next time I am in Chicago.

I live down the street from here and the food is consistent. It is a hidden gem as it relates to brunch. Though the menu for brunch is smaller, it is the best avocado toast in Chicago. Better than my previous favorite, Soho house. They have a great rooftop for the summertime and a great happy hour menu.

Food was good, but not very impressive.   Lentil soup was too salty. Raw onion in the tuna poke overwhelmed the tuna and avocado. The two best things we had were sides (fries and brussel sprouts).  I would maybe go back for drinks and appetizers, but would look for other options for dinner.
Food wasn't bad, but a bit slow and service was not that attentive
Perfect spot to meet someone and have a delicious casual meal with high quality ingredients and gracious service.
Only got drinks here, but they’re well made and the service is great. They could add more ciders to the selection.
It was good. Roof top bar is fun. Great place to spend a relaxing afternoon or evening.
Good food. Sevice is slow
My office is nearby so I eat lunch here a lot. Really good food, awesome build your own salads, Cool vibe and nice rooftop.
Great rooftop and wonderful breakfast sandwiches.   The bread is out of this world.
The lamb hashwi is excellent - not sure that anything else on the menu is nearly as good. Friends and coworkers have mixed feelings about other dishes, and overall the place is a bit pricey.

Very good food. Portions are extremely small. Not happy we spent 60 bucks to leave hungry. Got steak and eggs for 21 bucks and the steak was smaller than my palm. Very upsetting and wouldn't come back.
Great rooftop! Our server was very nice and the food was good, though a little over priced.
The aesthetic of this place is amazing. Top it off with great liquor and beer selection and you've got a winner. Will be trying the food next time for sure.
Nice rooftop patio/ bar.  Food is average.
Eude people! They don’t even answer your question! Don’t care that you are waiting to get drinks because we were there on happy hour!

I hate giving places good review because it attracts more attention but their breakfast brunch menu is robust and delicious. I have likely ordered it all during my 10+visits and it is all good.  What keeps me coming back is that unlikely other breakfast spots, normally never a wait on weekends.
Not a fan of the crowd here
Bartender is usually a db
The beer mussels are the best.

This place was great, went up to the rooftop to eat but the kitchen had closed already and  the bartender was very accommodating and real with us too about where to go to get food..definitely coming back for the food here tho. Came for the avocado toast...stayed for the drinks
Service was slow and food was over priced
The burger was good, but overpriced and fell apart easily. The chips were good, but you only get like 7 of em. I like it, but wouldn't go out of my way to eat there, again.
Small portion lunch. Had the pork carnitas gyro...taste was fine but my portion was extremely fatty (had to pick through half the meat). Good homemade fries, which were $2 up charge.
Top 5 rooftop patio in the city. Somewhat of a hidden gem.
Service was very slow.
Awesome happy hour and great customer service! Nicole went above and beyond my expectations

Decent brunch menu, but the portions seem to be either small-plate size, or gigantic. Staff were helpful and attentive and the atmosphere is nice. A little more upscale than some other places, but this is in River North.
Don't order the side of fries!

I just want to say how amazing everything was! We had our rehearsal dinner there with about 20 guests in the gorgeous rooftop. Service was impeccable. I think it was Kyle who was our server - he gave his coat to the father-of-the-bride as it was chilly, and the GM gave his blazer to another one of our guests! So nice! The food was also AMAZING, as were the drinks. If we could do it all over again we would definitely have our rehearsal dinner at Bernies! Thank you!
I went for lunch! took bartender 10 minutes to recognize me. I built my own salad that was the best part! wish the menu had a little more.
Price point absurd.
Great rooftop
Nice rooftop patio with unique cocktail menu. Slightly expensive.
Great food, enjoyed the rooftop!
Good place to eat
Nice rooftop space but the service was very poor and food was forgettable.
The rooftop is wonderful and happy hour specials are so good!! I love their sangria and patatas bravas!

Positives: The rooftop is beautiful and the food is tasty! That’s it!  Negatives: My friends and I have tried to give this place a chance time and time again. It’s right across the street from where we live so the location is perfect. They’re always out of something: fries, tuna, beer, rosé... somehow every time we go, they’re out of something we want.  Yesterday’s terrible service took the cake though. Hostess and manager wouldn’t let my girlfriends up to the patio because they had “no space” (despite a completely open bar at one point). They finally get up, the manager half-apologizes, we move on. At 5:29, I reluctantly order food knowing it’s probably going to take awhile. At 5:59, I finally ask the bartender, “Do you know when my appetizer will be out?” And he says, “Yeah... I probably forgot to put that in”. My friends are livid at this point. He goes to the computer and says, “Do you want it or not?!” No sorry, no nothing. At the VERY LEAST, admit fault. I am not upset that he forgot, accidents happen. But apologize, accept fault and move on. Make it right. Something.  We so wanted this to be the new hot place. But it’s not. I can get over being out of things, obviously whoever is in charge of purchasing needs a refresher on what to stock, but the bad service is unacceptable. I’ve worked in customer service and hospitality for 12 years. This level of service is shameful.
Been here 75 minutes and still waiting on dinner. Judging by the complaints I keep hearing, we’re not the only table that hasn’t gotten food
Fantastic! Very knowledgeable and friendly staff. Great food. Great drinks. Great service. Highly recommend.
Great ambiance and food. Slightly on the expensive side, but it is in river north. Food is good - Happy hour drinks are great.
Croque madame and old fashioned we're amazing as was the lamb. I cannot wait to try more!
Great food and service. Reliable local spot.

Beautiful space, cozy interior, open air rooftop, 2 bars with a top notch bev program and elevated, approachable cuisine and a warm, hospitable staff! Easily one of my favorite spots in Chicago. Do it!
BEAUTIFUL space and a very good lunch menu. I love the tomato soup and the turkey burger. More than enough fries to go around as well.

Looks nice... That's all the positives I have for this place.  Let's get to the negatives because let's be honest that's why you are reading this one star review. Service was sub-par at best.  They weren't busy because we were seated right away. One would expect great service for a swankie place like this, but that was far from it. Waitress was not well informed of the specials or decided not to tell us, either way we got the short end of the stick.  Luckily one of our meals was a happy hour special!  Yay! But we didn't find out until the check came of course, so we ended up paying 6 more bucks for a similar burger.  Oh and BTW, avocado is not the same as guacamole, yes avocado is in guacamole but that's like saying corn is the same as poop.  Is it?  Now on to my order, I ordered brick chicken.  I was looking for something that came with sides because most of the meals didn't (yes that includes the 17 dollar burger above) and boy was I surprised.  I got a chicken brick instead and it was horrible, I took 2 bites and was already thinking if I still had a frozen pizza in my freezer when I got home.  Luckily good ole Jack's was there to spare me that night!
Delicious appetizers and meal. Also accommodating to a group with an infant
Always have a solid experience here with spotty service.
Rooftop is very fun and staff are very friendly. Have come back on multiple occasions.
Impolite dirty services and mediocre quality
Great place for salad, pick your own ingredients.

My husband and I love grabbing a seat at the bar between their brunch/lunch and dinner services (3-5PM).  We each have a cheeseburger, share the fries with garlic aioli and enjoy one of the many beers on tap or a bartender created cocktail.  Pictured is the Posh Spice.
Very good food. A little slow getting the food out.
Loved it... everything was perfect. Can't wait to go back
great bar eats and drinks
Good food, good drinks, okay service.
Good brunch
Great food, average service
Probably the best burger in town but this is twice now we’ve had to wait over an hour for our food.
Good place to share apps and sides. Super thin fries, awesomely delicious "tuna crudo" dish, and fried falafel was good too!
Favorite burger in town, despite the tough competition. Great fries, salad, and drinks too. Classy lunch spot indoors, relaxing summer siesta on the roofdeck.

Horrible service all I ordered was a burger it took like 30 mins to come they give you a side order of chips and a pickle spear with every burger dish well the chips were stale and the burger was under cooked the cooks are loud and unprofessional I heard one of the cooks cursing at another cook just an all around bad experience with this restaurant aw yeah did I mention the prices are outrageous $13.00 for a burger come on man I would not recommend this place to anyone and I mean anyone...
Great atmosphere, reasonable happy hour from 5-7pm, and the greens and grain salad is amazing. Seriously order that salad.
The food is great. Service is terrible. I have been here many times and would come more if not for the poor service.
Pretty good brunch spot
Great food and drinks in a great atmosphere!
Good place to come for after work drinks and appetizers.
Solid although a bit overpriced American fair. Mixture between hipster and upper crust.
Build your own delicious salad
Great place to get a bite to eat. Awesome upstairs area, good cocktails
May closed for suicide jump on tho roof too high drug place be aware
Awesome roof deck, great food
Very impressed. Great Beer list. Burger was great. Service was excellent.
AMAZING!!!
Delicious food.
Great lunch, great patio
Bernie's has the best Happy Hour specials and an amazing rooftop!

This place had delicious snacks and solid happy hour prices. The upstairs patio was nice. Bartender upstairs was MIA a lot which was frustrating and took his time with draft beers. But that aside, good prices and location, definitely worth stopping by if it's happy hour!
Always a good place to grab a quick bite and drinks. Amazing happy hour deals.
Great fries and burgers
Great deck and happy hour 5-7 M-F
sweet spot!!
Cool spot with a great rooftop deck
Delicious, satisfying, and appropriately priced small plates. Great atmosphere and comfortable rooftop seating.
Food was a bit salty but good overall. Took a while to get service and delivery
The worst.  Slow, waiters got nothing correct. We had a large but very undemanding group. Did I say they were slow and waiters clueless?  Food plain
Great happy hour specials and wonderful service
Great place for a casual group dinner! Plates are easily shareable, easy to make reservations, friendly staff that gave us excellent suggestions. Delicious Mediterranean food!

Great food, shocking bar service.  Update- went back to see if the service was just a one off - it was worse. Do Not sit at the bar, even if you only required  t minimal hospitality and service. Worthless!
This place is crazy good .....brunch is off the charts .....I give it a 25 out of a 1 to 10
The waiter recommended the turkey burger as the best in the City.... It was very, very good!  Nice place, somewhat unique take on sandwiches.
Good food and drinks but a lot of the food menu items were out of stock. Great roof for the summer
Food was great (I had the happy hour burger) Good service,  but a bit too pricey for me (although the happy hour was spot on).  Not great for small kids but acceptable
delicious but careful sometimes they run out of certain ingredients on their menu. went there for brunch on a Sunday and had the big table in the front by the window - heaven!
Great feeling and what's really going to

Probably the best slider I've ever tasted in my life. It's a big pretentious here, but they have a great beer list and an even more extensive cocktail list (if you're in to that sort of thing). The food is generally classy bar food, and it's all very good.
Fantastic happy hour! $4 draft beers and reduced price appetizers.
Fun happy hour spot, great rooftop when it's warm out. The fried egg sandwich is delicious, the burger is good too.

Love, love, love the burger! The rooftop is a lot of fun. I took a random day off, e.g., Wednesday and hung out here on the rooftop. Such a special day. From what I understand this is a new place as of 2016, so expect 2017 to be busier and harder to get in... :p

The food is good the drinks are overpriced and the wait staff can be down right rude. I had a drink and a few appetizers with some friends and as we were finishing a waiter came up to the table and said, "I am going to need that table at 7:15 you are already cashed out." We had only been there for 45 minutes and it was 7:05.
A bit loud so ended sitting around the bat, way better.
I give it 5 stars because I think that if I was a regular, I would be familiar with the dishes. Since I'm not, I personally rate it 4 stars, but it's not fair if I'm not familiar with all the dishes.
Nothing  special .food Ok .drinks  need inprovement. Noisy ' atmosphere  can be improved ,service  ok

So disappointed with this place. The burger wasn't bad, very greasy and didn't come out the way I asked. You get a tiny side of chips, I'm talking like 5 total with a tiny amount of ketchup. I was definitely expecting fries. The worst part was the service. The dinning room was a bit busy, but the bar where myself and company were sitting was not at all. In fact there was only 2 other people at the bar. The service was unbelievably slow. We asked for things so many times that we did not get. I don't know what was up with the bartender but she really seemed out of place. I wanted to talk to the manager but we were in a hurry and he seemed busy. Paid $70 for 2 burgers and 2 beers... Yeah I know... Will not return.
Great food and great service
Great decor and food

Nice vibrant place with open kitchen. Make your own salad is great, this way you get to try out something new every time. Place gets loud when it's busy so prepare to scream at others on your table. :-)
Great food and nice atmosphere to enjoy lunch with family and friends.
Great happy hour! Cheap drinks with good Apps!
Fresh and creative. Our group of four  all gave it 5 stars... can't wait to come back for the paella..
Great place. We go here for brunch almost once a week; wonderful food, service, and atmosphere. Does not feel overpriced. Only downside: not a big fan of the coffee.
Good place for brunch. Kind of pricey, but worth it.

I was disappointed by my experience here because I had higher expectations. The food was OK- the only dish that was fantastic was the lamb hashwi. We also had terrible service. However, I would come back and try again.
Good happy hour specials... Atmosphere is nice. The paella was the worst I've ever had in my life.
Rooftop is a hidden gem and $5 "bubbles" at happy hour is just what you need on a weekday.

My husband and I happened upon this charming spot during their between service and we ordered 'just' two burgers and a half order of fries.  in no way is this 'just' a burger - prepare to be amazed and come hungry.  it was rich and delicious, obviously homemade and cooked to perfection. loved the rooftop as well with plenty of shade and comfortable seating.
Good service,  bad food
Superb food & craft cocktails in a charming, thoughtful setting. These guys didn't miss a single detail. Interesting and memorable concept. Staff is amazing.
Great atmosphere, good drink selection, and the apps are delicious. If you're going to eat something, get the hummus. The pita it comes with is outstanding!

Bernie's is quite possibly one of my all time favorite restaurants in Chicago.   Every dish I have ordered here has been incredible.   I originally went for their amazing rooftop and was completely blown away by all the different flavors on their menu.   If you are looking for an awesome brunch, lunch or dinner you absolutely have to try Bernie's.
I'd definitely go back if I'm in town.
A really great rooftop patio.
Great burgers and build your own salad options. roof deck looks amazing.
Melt in your mouth pita was the best I've ever tasted, perfectly poached eggs, and creamy wood oven oysters
Great happy hour deals.

They have one of the best out door bars in the city. They also have incredible happy hour with three dollar draft beers. The beers are incredible too, but they did "run out" around 630. Service was amazing and view is even better.

Great atmosphere, friendly service and delicious, creative takes on more traditional comfort food dishes. Paella was wonderful and so was the pork raclette pate. Clever bartender fixed a near spot-on version of my favorite cocktail without the proper ingredients which was so appreciated. A little bit pricey but worth the chair rental for the fabulous rooftop setting.
Great spot for food! Rooftop is a must
Great rooftop and happy hour

Great experience at Bernie's. Food was surprisingly good--particularly the oyster dish--and the bar tender's choice cocktail was impressive and unique. The staff was very friendly as you'd expect in a restaurant's first week, but it was much appreciated. And the interior was very enjoyable--I look forward to the opening of the rooftop. I'll definitely be back soon.  UPDATE 5/28/16: 4 Stars  I've been back to Bernie's a number of times now. While I still feel they are a very decent restaurant, with good ideas and a solid underlying feel for ingredients and preparation, I can't say I've been very impressed with their execution. Every visit feels like they are still working out some kinks--whether it is with timing or the consistency of the kitchen and bar--there always seems to be something holding me back from being fully satisfied by my visit. It's as if the restaurant is overwhelmed--not by a rush of tables, but at the prospect of operating on the big stage of the Chicago culinary scene. I'm still pretty confident in the underlying chops of the showmakers behind the scenes, I just hope they can get to a place where they are delivering on all they clearly expect I'd themselves.

Bernie's is awesome! They have, what I consider the best Happy Hours (from 4 to 7) in River North. I uploaded a photo of the menu. The food is different and outstanding. Order the Lamb Hashwi. It's like Hummus on steroids....or steroids (in the form of delicious lamb) on Hummus! Their rooftop patio is big and offers outstanding views of the city. The patio is partially covered so it can also be enjoyed even if the weather is less than great. Bernie's location is in the heart of River North, so it is definitely a popular spot. The patio fills up fast, so get there early if you want a seat.
Went here for a quick brunch, had a custom frittata and some coffee. If you are extremely hunger would recommend another option, frittata is small but delicious.
Great food and atmosphere. Menu changes seasonally. Craft beer selection was curated well but lacking variety.
The BLT is nothing like what you expect. Amazing.
Exceptional food.

What a terrific find in River North.  The build out on the 1st level of the restaurant is very cool. It's got a great menu with so many fun dishes that were all amazing and covered a wide range of flavors.  The pork was amazing, and the burger is seriously the best burger ever.  They have a fun cocktail menu with great choices, and best of all - they have a great roof top for a drink or dinner.  A must try.
